short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Calendar events on your new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you need to stay on top of your daily, weekly and monthly schedule, CalendarViewTab is for you. Each time you launch a new Chrome tab, you will see at a glance all your events for the month. This extension works with Google Calendar so all your events will appear on the new tab simply by signing into your Google Account. As such a Google Account is required for this extension to function as designed. 

This extension includes a search feature as part of the new tab experience. The search bar is powered by Yahoo!

Terms of Service: https://calendarviewtab.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: https://calendarviewtab.com/privacy-policy/
Contact Us: https://calendarviewtab.com/contact/
Uninstall Information: https://calendarviewtab.com/uninstall/

Permissions Requested By This Extension
To perform the functions described in this extension, the following permissions are requested:

Identity 
Needed to display Google Calendar events on the new tab page.
